text: The convenience sampling method was used and participants were randomly assigned to one of the two groups, with a blocking design. In this regard the corresponding authors and the statistician were not present in patient enrollment and the first author was not involved in data analysis.
sentences: The convenience sampling method was used and participants were randomly assigned to one of the two groups, with a blocking design.
In this regard the corresponding authors and the statistician were not present in patient enrollment and the first author was not involved in data analysis.
